lines.text: I'm Leopold, remember? Some part I got in this picture! Fooey!
What a place. What a place. All it needs is hands coming out of the walls... like those over my head.
Oh, you mad, impetuous boy you!
Why did you hit me on the head, Leopold? Don't you know that might make me very angry, and I would do terrible, horrible things to you?

[Opens a door and sees a moving landscape in the other side, as if from a moving train]
Say, that's just plain old silly!
Oh, well. It didn't work at that place, but it's sure to work in this house.

[Coming out of the house]
Not so fast! I'm working this side of the street... you crazy!
So I'm flying south jet propelled.

[Flying with a fan tied to his back]
You got company, duck. I'm headed south too.
